last December my husband always said to

Wooster she stunned that nine million
people have seen the picture she sent it
to the Crohn's and Colitis UK Facebook
page and released others to to try and
break down barriers for people like her
who have colostomy bags I felt like I
finally had the confidence after three
and a half years of having them that I
wanted to give other girls the

to be like we are nothing to be ashamed

find here we are from the age of three
Bethany's had Crohn's disease affecting
her ability to digest food and eliminate
waste four years ago her bowel burst and
she nearly died she woke up in hospital
with colostomy bags which she'll have
for the rest of her life undeterred she
now wants to resume a part-time modeling
career as soon as I had my cross my bags
my confidence was totally not and I lost
so much weight through going all of that
that I just I wasn't who I was anymore I
suppose and I didn't feel like I could
kind of do that again Bethany also works
as a makeup artist and he's building up
her strength after years of illness the
charity which publicized her picture
says she's an inspiration the feedback
we've had on our Facebook page in
particular has been really encouraging
and people are really drawing strength
from what she's doing these are
conditions that people don't want to
talk about so it's important we get
greater awareness greater understanding
of grating greater profile for these
conditions so the work that Bethany's
doing is just really helping us to do
that Bethany is amazed by the publicity
she's attracted I never thought it would
get a response like that to me it's just
a picture but to so many other people is
